title: BLES01717-[Call of Duty Black Ops II][PS3][MaSsUp]
description:
Game            Call of Duty: Black Ops II
Developer(s)	Treyarch
Publisher(s)	WW Activision
                JP Square Enix
Engine	        Black Ops II engine 
Released	WW November 12, 2012 
                JP December 20, 2012             
Genre	        First-person shooter
Mode(s)	        Single-player, multiplayer, Co-op 
CONSOLE         PS3
GAME REGION     BLES01717 (EUR)
---------------------------------------------------
How To Install : 
1. Copy ( BLES01717-[Call of Duty Black Ops II] ) into USB Drive (Fat32) .
2. Connect The USB Drive to the "PS3" and Launch "Multiman".
3. Open "File manager /mmOS" or just press "Start+Select" at the same time.
4. Copy (BLES01717-[Call of Duty Black Ops II]) from : "PS3 Root = dev_usb000" .
5. Paste the copied folder into this Location : "PS3 Root = dev_hdd0 = Games" .
6. Launch the game and Enjoy.
---------------------------------------------------
Note : this Game doesn't require "BD Mirror" setting to work .
---------------------------------------------------
To enable "BD Mirror" Setting : 
1. Launch "Multiman" .
2. Navigate to the game you want to enable "BD Mirror" then press "Square".
3. Under The "Game Cover" Navigate to "BD Mirror" and Press "X" .
